thread.section_title: Soltech Security Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Soltech Security | www.soltechsecurity.com
thread.title: Marjorie Marshall
thread.title_full: Soltech Security reviewed by Marjorie Marshall

author: Marjorie Marshall
title: Marjorie Marshall
text: I thought Soltech was easy to deal with, though my return/refund hasn't been completed yet so that may change :) I loved the camera, which I bought to monitor my dogs while I'm at work. I did not realize that a subscription to a monitoring company was required to use it, however, so I returned it.
